Description.Text: Hotel Rudolfshof is a family-friendly 4-star property offering comfortable accommodation near the heart of Kaprun. Highlights include an indoor swimming pool, a wellness area, free Wi-Fi and a good location close to the ski bus stop and Lechnerberg nursery slopes. Kaprun is a small alpine village situated at the foot of the Kitzsteinhorn Glacier, just southeast of Zell am See. It offers stunning scenery and all-year skiing. It is also home to the 12th-century Kaprun Castle, one of the oldest of its kind in the providence. There is a bus stop in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to the ski slopes. The hotel is housed in a traditional mid-rise building featuring a light-coloured facade with wood balconies. Facilities include a kids' club and a wellness area offering an indoor swimming pool, a sauna, steam room, infrared cabin and a massage treatment room. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are comfortably furnished and feature a balcony. Amenities include satellite TV, a work desk, mini-bar, safe and an en-suite bathroom. The onsite restaurant serves regional dishes in a relaxed setting. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks, snacks and light meals at the hotel bar, and a buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Free parking is possible onsite. There is a complimentary shuttle service to the Kitzsteinhorn Glacier.
